entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 9:08 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:08 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:08 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
